item.title: Mode Control Panel Switches – IAS/MACH SEL (Reference) Switch

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided IAS is displayed in associated window.

placard.para: Placard IAS/MACH SEL Switch "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.title: MODE CONTROL PANEL SWITCHES (REFERENCE) SWITCH
maintenance.para: For dispatch with an inoperative IAS/MACH SEL Switch, IAS must be displayed in the associated MCP window. If MACH is displayed, simultaneously cycling P7 panel MCP L and MCP R circuit breakers will cause IAS to be displayed in the window.
